landingPage.subtitle: Start your training journey here and now!

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: Workout plan
step2.text: Choose one of many workout plans which fits you the most.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Train
step3.text: Start training with choosen workout plan and achieve your goals.

landingPage.slogan: Collect your data and visualize it with our charts and graphs. It'll help you track your progress and stay motivated. It's like having a personal coach in your pocket! Don't wait, start your fitness journey today!

step1.label: Account
step1.title: Create account
step1.text: Firstly, create your account on our website.

step2.label: Personal data
step2.title: Personal data
step2.text: Let's get to know you better! Please provide your personal data.

step3.label: Finish
step3.title: Finish
step3.text: What should we call you, champ?
